verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni raajyamu samayamu vachchenu Rakshana pondedavu neevu viswasinchina{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manuja roopamu dharinchi swargamu digi vachchenu Thanadu rakhtamu dwaaraane paapa bandhamu thrunchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Caluvariloni siluvalo praanamu narpinchenu Ellari paapamulakai thanadu rakhtamu kaarachenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Samayamu ledu sodaraa thwarapadi rammu vegame Suvaarthanu viswasinchi rakshananu pondumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa saagaramu nandu enthakaala munduvu ? Paapa saagaramu nundi Yesu prabhu vidipinchunu{/lang-eng}
